title: authentication login endpoint
description: Test the /auth/login POST endpoint for successful login with valid credentials, invalid data handling, and incorrect credentials response.

title: authentication logout endpoint
description: Verify the /auth/logout POST endpoint to ensure session termination works correctly and handles internal server errors.

title: authentication register endpoint
description: Validate the /auth/register POST endpoint for user creation, including permission checks and invalid data handling.

title: authentication change password endpoint
description: Check the /auth/change-password POST endpoint for password update success, validation failures, and unauthorized access.

title: user logs list endpoint
description: Test the /logs/ GET endpoint for listing user logs with various filters, pagination, and secure access.

title: user logs statistics endpoint
description: Verify the /logs/stats GET endpoint to retrieve log statistics filtered by company and days with proper authentication.

title: user logs entity activity endpoint
description: Validate the /logs/entity-activity/{entity_type}/{entity_id} GET endpoint for fetching logs by entity, including not found and error cases.

title: route audit summary endpoint
description: Test the /route-audit/api/summary GET endpoint for returning audit summary data with access control and error handling.

title: route audit routes list endpoint
description: Verify the /route-audit/api/routes GET endpoint for listing routes with filters like all, with_logging, without_logging, and crud.

title: route audit enable auto logging endpoint
description: Check the /route-audit/api/entity/{entity_type}/enable POST endpoint to enable auto logging for a given entity type with permission checks.
